products.name: COMBO GOALS LIP 'N' CHEEK
products.description:
Sugar, spice and everything nice!

Buildable, highly pigmented color for a non-sticky shine that will have your lips feeling like a star and smelling like vanilla ice-cream.

The creamy formula glides on smoothly without feeling goopy and the doe-foot applicator ensures an epic shine in just one stroke.
products.ingredients: Vegan, cruelty free, talc free, parabens free, no D4/D5/D6, mineral and palm oils free, RSPO, hypoallergenic', 'contains': 'POLYBUTENE, PENTAERYTHRITYL TETRAISOSTEARATE, SILICA DIMETHYL SILYLATE, OCTYLDODECANOL, ISOSTEARYL ISOSTEARATE, MICROCRYSTALLINE WAX(CERA MICROCRISTALLINA), MICA, DICALCIUM PHOSPHATE, ETHYL VANILLIN, PENTAERYTHRITYL TETRA-DI-T-BUTYL HYDROXYHYDROCINNAMATE, TIN OXIDE MAY CONTAIN/ (+/-):CI 77891(TITANIUM DIOXIDE), CI 77491(IRON OXIDES),CI77492(IRON OXIDES), CI 15850(RED 6), CI 15850(RED 7 LAKE), CI 45410(RED 28 LAKE), CI 42090(BLUE 1 LAKE), CI 19140(YELLOW 5 LAKE), CI 15985(YELLOW 6 LAKE)
